metadata.title: CVE-2023-0056 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability was discovered inHAProxy which could crash the service. This issue could allow anauthenticated remote attacker to run a specially crafted malicious serverin an OpenShift cluster. The biggest impact is to availability.

criterions.comment: haproxy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
